subject: Tiếng Anh
description: Easy exercises for Grade 5 English (Lớp 5 Tiếng Anh) - basic practice

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: I live in a ______ (house / book).
exercises.question: Choose the correct word: I live in a ______
exercises.hint: We live in a house or an apartment.

exercises.title: Complete the sentence: What's your ______? (A) address (B) name (C) age
exercises.question: Complete the sentence: What's your ______?
exercises.hint: We ask 'What's your address?' to know where someone lives.

exercises.title: Choose the correct answer: Where do you live?
exercises.question: Where do you live?
exercises.hint: When asked 'Where do you live?', we answer with a place.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 3 sentences about where you live
exercises.question: Write 3 sentences about where you live
exercises.hint: Use: I live in..., My address is..., I live in a...
exercises.answer: Example: I live in Hanoi. My address is 123 Le Loi Street. I live in a house.

exercises.title: Choose the correct answer: What's your address?
exercises.question: What's your address?

options.A: My address is 123 Le Loi Street.

exercises.hint: When asked about address, we answer with 'My address is...'

exercises.title: Nêu hiểu biết của em về Asking and answering about addresses
exercises.question: Nêu hiểu biết của em về Asking and answering about addresses (Câu 12/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy viết ngắn gọn, rõ ràng về Asking and answering about addresses.
exercises.answer: Đây là câu trả lời ngắn gọn về Asking and answering about addresses. Kiến thức cơ bản cần được trình bày rõ ràng và dễ hiểu.

exercises.title: Hiểu biết cơ bản về Asking and answering about addresses
exercises.question: Hiểu biết cơ bản về Asking and answering about addresses (Câu 13/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy suy nghĩ về kiến thức cơ bản của Asking and answering about addresses.

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: The village is very ______ (quiet / loud).
exercises.question: Choose the correct word: The village is very ______
exercises.hint: Villages are usually quiet places.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Describe your hometown in 3 sentences
exercises.question: Describe your hometown in 3 sentences
exercises.hint: Use words like: big, small, quiet, busy, beautiful...
exercises.answer: Example: My hometown is Hanoi. It is a big city. It is very busy and beautiful.

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: The city is very ______ (big / small).
exercises.question: The city is very ______
exercises.hint: Cities are usually big places.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 2 sentences comparing a city and a village
exercises.question: Write 2 sentences comparing a city and a village
exercises.hint: Use: big/small, busy/quiet...
exercises.answer: Example: A city is big and busy. A village is small and quiet.

exercises.title: Trình bày ngắn gọn về Describing places
exercises.question: Trình bày ngắn gọn về Describing places (Câu 14/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy viết ngắn gọn, rõ ràng về Describing places.
exercises.answer: Đây là câu trả lời ngắn gọn về Describing places. Kiến thức cơ bản cần được trình bày rõ ràng và dễ hiểu.

exercises.title: Câu hỏi đơn giản về Describing places
exercises.question: Câu hỏi đơn giản về Describing places (Câu 15/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy suy nghĩ về kiến thức cơ bản của Describing places.

exercises.title: Choose the correct question: ______ do you live?
exercises.question: Choose the correct question: ______ do you live?
exercises.hint: We use 'Where' to ask about places.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 2 questions and answers about addresses
exercises.question: Write 2 questions and answers about addresses
exercises.hint: Use: Where do you live? What's your address?
exercises.answer: Example: Q: Where do you live? A: I live in Ho Chi Minh City. Q: What's your address? A: My address is 456 Nguyen Hue Street.

chapters.name: I always get up early. How about you?

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: I ______ up at 6 o'clock. (A) get (B) go (C) have
exercises.question: I ______ up at 6 o'clock.
exercises.hint: We say 'get up' for waking up in the morning.

exercises.title: Choose the correct sentence: I ______ breakfast at 7 a.m.
exercises.question: I ______ breakfast at 7 a.m.
exercises.hint: We say 'have breakfast' to mean eating breakfast.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 4 sentences about your daily routine
exercises.question: Write 4 sentences about your daily routine
exercises.hint: Use: get up, have breakfast, go to school, go to bed...
exercises.answer: Example: I get up at 6 o'clock. I have breakfast at 7 a.m. I go to school at 7:30. I go to bed at 9 p.m.

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: I ______ to school at 7:30. (A) go (B) get (C) have
exercises.question: I ______ to school at 7:30.
exercises.hint: We say 'go to school' to mean going to school.

exercises.title: Câu hỏi cơ bản về Daily routines
exercises.question: Câu hỏi cơ bản về Daily routines (Câu 11/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy suy nghĩ về kiến thức cơ bản của Daily routines.

exercises.title: Nêu hiểu biết của em về Daily routines
exercises.question: Nêu hiểu biết của em về Daily routines (Câu 12/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy viết ngắn gọn, rõ ràng về Daily routines.

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: I ______ brush my teeth. (A) always (B) never (C) sometimes
exercises.question: I ______ brush my teeth.
exercises.hint: We always brush our teeth every day.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 3 sentences using 'always', 'sometimes', 'never'
exercises.question: Write 3 sentences using 'always', 'sometimes', 'never'
exercises.hint: Example: I always do homework. I sometimes play games. I never go to bed late.
exercises.answer: Example: I always do my homework. I sometimes play football. I never watch TV late at night.

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: I ______ play football on weekends. (A) always (B) sometimes (C) never
exercises.question: I ______ play football on weekends.
exercises.hint: We sometimes play football, not always or never.

exercises.title: Hiểu biết cơ bản về Talking about frequency
exercises.question: Hiểu biết cơ bản về Talking about frequency (Câu 13/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy suy nghĩ về kiến thức cơ bản của Talking about frequency.

exercises.title: Trình bày ngắn gọn về Talking about frequency
exercises.question: Trình bày ngắn gọn về Talking about frequency (Câu 14/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy viết ngắn gọn, rõ ràng về Talking about frequency.

exercises.title: Choose the correct order: I ______ go to the park. (A) always (B) sometimes (C) never
exercises.question: I ______ go to the park on weekends.
exercises.hint: We sometimes go to the park, not always or never.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write sentences about what you always, sometimes, and never do
exercises.question: Write sentences about what you always, sometimes, and never do
exercises.hint: Use adverbs of frequency: always, usually, often, sometimes, never
exercises.answer: Example: I always go to school. I sometimes play games. I never skip breakfast.

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: I ______ go to bed late. (A) always (B) sometimes (C) never
exercises.question: I ______ go to bed late.
exercises.hint: We never go to bed late because it's not good for health.

exercises.title: Câu hỏi đơn giản về Grammar: Adverbs of frequency
exercises.question: Câu hỏi đơn giản về Grammar: Adverbs of frequency (Câu 15/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy suy nghĩ về kiến thức cơ bản của Grammar: Adverbs of frequency.

chapters.name: Where did you go on holiday?

exercises.title: Choose the correct verb: Yesterday I ______ to the beach. (A) go (B) went (C) goes
exercises.question: Yesterday I ______ to the beach.
exercises.hint: We use 'went' (past tense of 'go') when talking about the past.

exercises.title: Choose the correct verb: Last week, I ______ my grandparents. (A) visit (B) visited (C) visits
exercises.question: Last week, I ______ my grandparents.
exercises.hint: We use 'visited' (past tense) when talking about the past.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 3 sentences about what you did last weekend
exercises.question: Write 3 sentences about what you did last weekend
exercises.hint: Use past tense verbs: went, played, visited, watched...
exercises.answer: Example: Last weekend, I went to the park. I played football with my friends. I visited my grandparents.

exercises.title: Choose the correct verb: Last week, I ______ my friend. (A) visit (B) visited (C) visits
exercises.question: Last week, I ______ my friend.
exercises.hint: We use 'visited' (past tense) when talking about the past.

exercises.title: Choose the correct question: ______ did you go on holiday?
exercises.question: ______ did you go on holiday?
exercises.hint: We use 'Where' to ask about places.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write about your last holiday (4 sentences)
exercises.question: Write about your last holiday (4 sentences)
exercises.hint: Use: Where did you go? What did you do? Who did you go with?
exercises.answer: Example: Last summer, I went to Da Lat with my family. We visited many beautiful places. We took many photos. I had a great time.

exercises.title: Choose the correct question: ______ did you go on holiday? (A) Where (B) What (C) Who
exercises.question: ______ did you go on holiday?
exercises.hint: We use 'Where' to ask about places.

exercises.question: Hiểu biết cơ bản về Talking about holidays (Câu 13/15)

lessons.title: Grammar: Past simple with regular and irregular verbs

exercises.title: Choose the correct past tense: I ______ a book yesterday. (A) read (B) reads (C) reading)
exercises.question: I ______ a book yesterday.
exercises.hint: 'Read' is the same in present and past tense, but pronounced differently.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 3 sentences using past tense verbs (regular and irregular)
exercises.question: Write 3 sentences using past tense verbs (regular and irregular)
exercises.hint: Regular: played, visited, watched. Irregular: went, saw, ate.
exercises.answer: Example: I played football yesterday. I went to the zoo last week. I ate ice cream.

exercises.title: Choose the correct past tense: I ______ football yesterday. (A) play (B) played (C) plays
exercises.question: I ______ football yesterday.
exercises.hint: We use 'played' (past tense) when talking about the past.

exercises.title: Câu hỏi đơn giản về Grammar: Past simple with regular and irregular verbs
exercises.question: Câu hỏi đơn giản về Grammar: Past simple with regular and irregular verbs (Câu 15/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy suy nghĩ về kiến thức cơ bản của Grammar: Past simple with regular and irregular verbs.

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: I have a ______ (headache / happy).
exercises.question: I have a ______
exercises.hint: Headache is a health problem.

exercises.title: Choose the correct answer: What's the matter with you?
exercises.question: What's the matter with you?
exercises.hint: When asked about health problems, we answer with 'I have a...'

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 3 sentences about health problems
exercises.question: Write 3 sentences about health problems
exercises.hint: Use: I have a headache, I have a fever, I have a cold...
exercises.answer: Example: I have a headache. My friend has a toothache. My sister has a fever.

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: I have a ______ (toothache / happy).
exercises.question: I have a ______
exercises.hint: Toothache is a health problem.

exercises.title: Câu hỏi cơ bản về Health problems
exercises.question: Câu hỏi cơ bản về Health problems (Câu 11/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy suy nghĩ về kiến thức cơ bản của Health problems.

exercises.question: Nêu hiểu biết của em về Health problems (Câu 12/15)

exercises.title: Choose the correct advice: I have a headache. You ______ rest. (A) should (B) shouldn't (C) can't
exercises.question: I have a headache. You ______ rest.
exercises.hint: We use 'should' to give advice.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Give advice to someone who has a cold (3 sentences)
exercises.question: Give advice to someone who has a cold (3 sentences)
exercises.hint: Use: You should..., You shouldn't...
exercises.answer: Example: You should rest. You should drink warm water. You shouldn't go out in the cold.

exercises.title: Choose the correct word: You ______ eat too much candy. (A) should (B) shouldn't
exercises.question: You ______ eat too much candy.
exercises.hint: We shouldn't eat too much candy because it's not good for health.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 2 sentences about healthy habits using 'should'
exercises.question: Write 2 sentences about healthy habits using 'should'
exercises.hint: Example: You should exercise. You should eat vegetables.
exercises.answer: Example: You should exercise every day. You should eat fruits and vegetables.

exercises.title: Hiểu biết cơ bản về Giving advice
exercises.question: Hiểu biết cơ bản về Giving advice (Câu 13/15)
exercises.hint: Hãy suy nghĩ về kiến thức cơ bản của Giving advice.

exercises.title: Choose the correct sentence: You ______ eat too much candy. (A) should (B) shouldn't
exercises.question: You ______ eat too much candy.
exercises.hint: We shouldn't eat too much candy because it's not good for health.

exercises.title: Tự luận: Write 3 sentences using 'should' and 'shouldn't' about healthy habits
exercises.question: Write 3 sentences using 'should' and 'shouldn't' about healthy habits
exercises.hint: Example: You should exercise. You should eat vegetables. You shouldn't stay up late.
exercises.answer: Example: You should exercise every day. You should eat fruits and vegetables. You shouldn't watch TV too much.
